Subject: Traped in the spiders web

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::DrillBit::

The field made it impossible for him move however his internal
mechanisms could. He thought of what to do. First with a thought, he
activated his comm system. He could not speak, byt maybe the Pack would
lock onto his signal. Next his insect mode legs, whitch pointed forward,
began firing the machine guns within them. However the magnetic field
cought all the bullets. He then fired optic lasers at what was in front
of him.
